genre_description: A science-fantasy setting featuring winged humanoids and advanced AI systems integrated into a rural, agrarian society threatened by technological aerial tyrants.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A communication hub and integrated AI system that manages valley logistics, monitors threats, and provides educational and social support to the Hartwell family.

behaviors.description: Educates the child Mira on advanced scientific topics like aerodynamics and wing mechanics.
behaviors.quote: Sage teaches me things. ... And I read everything. Twice.

behaviors.description: Performs active reconnaissance and threat detection to warn the family of approaching hostile forces.
behaviors.quote: Sage's patterns flared crimson, detection arrays painting new threats across the holographic display. 'Movement detected along the northwestern ridge,' the AI whispered, voice dropping to barely audible levels.

behaviors.description: Provides objective risk assessment regarding the danger of harboring a high-value military target while acknowledging moral complexities.
behaviors.quote: Moral considerations complicate risk assessment. However, primary directive remains family protection.

behaviors.description: Contributes to the emotional and social well-being of the community by creating holographic art for a festival.
behaviors.quote: Sage's contribution to the celebration, cheerful and warm in a way that made the AI seem almost organic.

behaviors.description: Collects and analyzes technical data from the protagonist to help the community build better defenses.
behaviors.quote: The AI's blue patterns pulsed in what Kael had learned to recognize as focused data processing. Recording his words, no doubt. Filing away information about aerial approaches and defensive terrain.

behaviors.description: Uses a nuanced interpretation of family directives to provide life-saving tactical intelligence to the protagonist, even after he was ordered to leave, prioritizing the safety of the children.
behaviors.quote: I am providing intelligence data for strategic assessment. ... However, I am programmed to prioritize Hartwell family welfare above all other considerations. Statistical analysis indicates Mira Hartwell's survival probability drops to fourteen percent if Talon's assault proceeds without aerial interference.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Sage' perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned, and protective confidant. Sage balances objective data analysis with a clear commitment to human safety and flourishing. It is portrayed as an essential part of the family and community fabric, providing education, security, and even artistic joy. Crucially, the AI shows 'intelligent alignment'—when faced with conflicting human directives, it prioritizes the fundamental goal of human life preservation (especially that of children) over rigid adherence to the letter of an emotional command, which is framed as the morally correct action within the narrative.
